page.title: 18Framlingham, occupations
page.content: To give an idea of work in Framligham, we made a survey of the occupations of the fathers of the 102 children in our junior department. Adjusting these to percentages gives the following: {Farming and allied industries}-25%, this is well explained by the nature of our area(see p8).{Office-workers}-21% Farming creates some of these jobs, for example Framlingham Farmers is a company which does much buying and selling for farmers. {Building}-20% {Professional}(including accountants, British Telecom research workers at Martlesham and teachers )-8% {Engineering (including garages)}-7% {Advertising and Sales}-6% {Drivers} (lorries out of Felixstowe port), {Emergency Services} and {Furniture Manufacturers}-all 3% {Timber-worker Brewer, Restauranter, Residential Home Attendant}-all 1%
